g.text: Agreement Phase Currency Conversion - Mojaloop Connector Integration
Hmmm. I can only send in BWP.
I need to get some currency conversion
I'll ask FDH FX to perform my conversion
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
I will add a 33 BWP fee for undertaking the conversion.
Now I'll set an expiry time, sign the quotation object,
Now I'll sign the quotation object,
create an ILP prepare packet and return it in the intermediary object.
the ILP prepare packet contains the following items, all encoded:
- The amount being sent (i.e. in the source currency)
- The content of the conversion terms
